trans-unit.source: Provides data for preprocess input events.
Canceling a pre-process input stops the input from being processed further.
Listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> to determine if another handler canceled a pre-process input.
The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] events.
All <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event handlers are called, even if one of the handlers cancels the input.
To verify if a handler further up the tree canceled the input, listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
PreProcessInputEventArgs is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
Pre-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
Pre-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
Post-notify stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
Post-process stage.
The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
Cancels the processing of the input event.
Canceling a pre-process input stops the input from being processed further.
Listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> to determine if another handler canceled a pre-process input.
Determines whether processing of the input event was canceled.
Canceling a pre-process input stops the input from being processed further.
Listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> to determine if another handler canceled a pre-process input.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the processing was canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
